messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

oracle assigned items issue sent friday assigned items issue hi got following assigned items cannot clear items have response when clicked for load although least up appears never displays anything although know submitted approved through having these items filling pretty annoying have scroll next any other items assigned mainly work with view being cleared list pretty much unworkable kind regards head ext
